contents.text: Welcome to Netflix South Bay, your gateway to movies and TV shows on any device.
For account and billing assistance, press 1.
For subscription and plan options, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a subscription specialist.

navigationGoals: Upgrade my plan to Premium with Ultra HD and four simultaneous streams
I want to switch my plan from Basic to Premium and apply the military discount.
I want to review available subscription tiers and upgrade to the plan with the highest streaming bitrate.
I’d like to switch to a cheaper Netflix plan
I’d like to review my current subscription plan and explore any available student pricing options.

contents.text: For payment and billing questions, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: Clarify a double charge on my latest Netflix bill
I need to update my expired credit card so my next subscription payment goes through.
I need to update my payment method and reconcile a recent billing discrepancy on my account.
I need help understanding an unexpected charge on my account
I need to update my payment method and clarify an unexpected billing charge on my account.

contents.text: For technical support and streaming help, press 2.
If you are experiencing streaming or playback issues, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a streaming support agent.

navigationGoals: Resolve constant buffering issues when streaming shows on my laptop
My shows keep buffering on my tablet and I need streaming help.
I’m experiencing frequent buffering and resolution drops during playback—looking for network diagnostics and streaming troubleshooting.
My show keeps buffering and won’t play properly
I’m experiencing repeated buffering and playback interruptions on my laptop and need help troubleshooting.

contents.text: For device setup and compatibility questions, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to technical support for device setup.

navigationGoals: Help me install Netflix on my new Roku streaming stick
I just bought an Amazon Fire Stick and need help setting up Netflix on it.
I need help configuring Netflix on my new device and ensuring proper codec compatibility.
I need assistance setting up Netflix on my new TV
I need guidance setting up Netflix on my new smart TV and confirming it’s fully compatible.
